title: The Star maker = L'Uomo Delle Stelle
creator_credit: Giuseppe Tornatore, Vittorio Cecchi Gori, Summit Entertainment and Checci Gori Group
brief_description: From Guiseppe Tornatore, director of “Cinema Paradiso”, this is a story drenched in the filmmaker’s love for cinema. Set in Sicily in the early 1950s, it is the story of Joe Morelli (Sergio Castellitto), a con man who travels by truck from village to village posing as a film company representative. For a fee, he offers his victims screen tests, using passages from a script of “0
